text: Hey Azad, I hope you're well. In my opinion, a masters would not make much of a difference. You'd be spending a lot of money and very little guarantee at the end of it for a job. I think a good showreel would be much better. In your cover letter, explain what your goals are and show your obvious passion for VFX. Explain the extra things you are doing such as things like joining up to this forum to get advice how to further your career. The fact you wanted to seek a mentor to help you displays you are willing to ask for help and go the extra mile to try and further you goals. Also, talk about any talks or event you go to as well. This all show the extra things you do in order to further your knowledge.
